ResearchProjectDef.label: fremen tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learned ways of the Fremen. Adept at development of technology utilized from the scavenged parts of other technology. Firearms, Crysknife, and the Stillsuit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fremen mid tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learned ways of the Fremen. Improvements of the stillsuit including the mask, and sufficient knowledge to develop the basic spice refinery.
